description: This file defines a utility function to fetch top stories from Hacker News and creates an Agent instance to interact with this tool, including printing a response to summarize the top stories.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class imported from agno.agent used to create an agent that can utilize tools and interact with users.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches the top stories from Hacker News, returning a JSON string of the stories after removing the 'text' field if present.
